name: Zuzalu Townhall Activation
description:
This interactive gathering that is HIGHLY encouraged for all current residents to attend. This is your chance to help shape the future of our community! Come collaborate with other Zuzalians, and make a meaningful impact on our collective vision for Zuzalu now and in the future.


Our pop-up city is unlike any other and evolving rapidly. Your insights and creativity are invaluable in driving the growth of our community, and this meeting is the perfect opportunity to channel that energy into transformative ideas and projects.


As residents of the Zuzalu community, your participation is crucial for our continued success. We encourage you to bring your most ambitious ideas and an open mind, ready to constructively criticize, contribute and find solutions to support the growth and development of Zuzalu.


Telegram group to discuss questions and projects from this session.
gpt_description: In this video, the speaker discusses the Zolomstack and how people can contribute to it. They plan to have regular town halls and deeper discussions about specific aspects of Zolomst. They also want to create specific working groups for people who care about or have suggestions in specific areas such as health, online tools, future scaling, and location and tech logistics. The speaker also talks about the Hackathon focus and how they plan to empower builders with tools and have a public goods funding round. They also discuss community technical infrastructure and how they want to support more people to build on top of or alongside existing infrastructure. The Zolomstack passport is mentioned as a simple application that stores a ZK friendly key pair for all Zolom residents and visitors that can be used to authenticate into other services or build on top of.
